features: Portable Solid State Drive: Fed up with carrying around a large external hard drive? USB3.1 PSSD brings a new level of portable external storage without the usual bulkiness. Handy size that can be added to a keyring and taken everywhere.

Super Fast Speeds: High Speed game loading, video transmission and processing. Read 5 times faster than regular hard drives while writing twice as fast, ensuring fast and stable use.(Actual Transfer Speeds will also depend on on operation environment, computer equipment, file sizes and other factors)

Professional Use: Ideal for safely and quickly storing or transferring large files, such as documents, Hi-Resolution pictures and 8K/4K UHD videos. Supports TRIM command, Garbage Collection technology, RAID, and ECC (Error Checking & Correction) to provide the optimized performance and enhanced reliability.

High Compatibility: Its strong compatibility makes it compatible with 99% of PC systems, including, Windows 10/8.1/8/7/Windows Server 2003 (32 bit and 64 bit), Vista (SP1 and above), XP (SP2 and above), Apple Mac, MAC OSX, android and Linux
High Quality: Superior quality metal casing with convenient keyring hole and lid to protect the USB connector plug.

Plus, with capacities up to 1TB, you'll have plenty of room to store all your important files and media. Say goodbye to the days of constantly having to delete files to free up space. Upgrade to an SSD today. USB SSD brings a new level of portable external storage without the usual bulkiness. Handy size that can be added to a keyring and taken everywhere. Perfect for high speed game loading, video transmission and processing. The high READ and WRITE speeds with no moving parts ensure fast and stable use. Ideal for safely and quickly storing or transferring large files, such as documents, Hi-Resolution pictures and 8K/4K UHD videos. High quality metal casing with convenient keyring hole and lid to protect the USB connector plug.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Portable External Solid State Drive LQH TECH introduces the ultimate upgrade for your computer: a portable USB solid state drive (SSD)! With lightning-fast speeds and unbeatable reliability, an SSD is the perfect way to boost your computer's performance and take your work or gaming experience to the next level.

High Speed, Small Size Our portable USB SSD is small in size but packs a powerful punch, offering high storage capacity alongside professional performance. With its compact design, you can easily take it with you on the go, whether you're traveling for work or just need to transfer files between computers. USB 3.0 Interface Designed with ease in mind it fits perfectly into any USB 3.0 port. Don't let its small size fool you, our USB SSDs are durable and reliable, perfect for storing large files, videos, and photos. Plus, with no moving parts, our USB SSDs have high reliability and durability. Ultra Fast Transfer Speed The aim of our SSDs is to provide lightning-fast read and write speeds, making them the perfect solution for anyone looking to boost their computer's performance. With our SSDs, you'll experience superfast boot times, superfast program loading, and high performance. High Compatibility Introducing the ultimate in USB compatibility: LQH Tech SSDs are designed to work seamlessly with a wide range of devices and operating systems including Windows, Mac and Linux. Whether you're using a desktop, laptop, or even a gaming console, our SSDs are the perfect solution for boosting performance and increasing storage capacity.

High Compatibility - Perfect for business or pleasure High Performance Storage Technology Upgrade your storage with our state-of-the-art Solid State Drive (SSD). With lightning-fast read and write speeds, our SSDs are the perfect solution for anyone in need of reliable and efficient storage. Whether you're a professional, a content creator, a gamer, or simply looking to upgrade your computer's performance, our SSDs are sure to meet your needs. Our SSDs feature a durable, lightweight design and are built with the latest technology, ensuring that your data is always safe and secure. With no moving parts, our SSDs are very reliable and long-lasting. Experience the benefits for yourself. Enjoy fast boot times, fast program loading and overall performance by purchasing an SSD today and feel the true power of high-performance storage technology.

Portable USB SSD No Messy Wires USB Solid State Drives do not require additional power or data cables, as they can be plugged directly into a USB port. This eliminates the need to carry additional cables and makes it easy to connect to a wide range of devices with USB 3.0 ports. Portable Solid State Drive Extreme Performance - Remarkably Small Our SSDs have no moving parts, making them incredibly durable and resistant to damage. They have superfast read and write speeds, which means your computer will boot up, load programs, and transfer files much faster than ever before. Plus, with capacities up to 1TB, you'll have plenty of room to store all your important files and media. Say goodbye to the days of constantly having to delete files to free up space. Upgrade to an SSD today. USB SSD brings a new level of portable external storage without the usual bulkiness. Handy size that can be added to a keyring and taken everywhere. Perfect for high speed game loading, video transmission and processing. The high READ and WRITE speeds with no moving parts ensure fast and stable use. Ideal for safely and quickly storing or transferring large files, such as documents, Hi-Resolution pictures and 8K/4K UHD videos. High quality metal casing with convenient keyring hole and lid to protect the USB connector plug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice SSD thumb drive
reviews.reviewText: Very nice metal build quality. Gets a bit hot tho

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works Fine on a Mac - Speeds Throttled
reviews.reviewText: Updated - I plugged this into my usb-c port with an adapter and I'm getting much better speeds now. Closer to 550mb/s so perhaps it is just my USB-A ports aren't up to snuff. Original review below.Original Review:I'm using this on a Mac running OS X 13.2.1. I'm getting speeds around 400m/s read and write which is completely acceptable for my usage.I'm really just using this as an intermittent backup solution for my photo library. Generally speaking, I just plug it in, replicate my library to it, and put it back in a safe place. That said, it is very quick for a flash drive and much faster than my standard USB spinning disk storage. Overall, I'm pleased with the performance. However, I did notice that it would slow down considerably after a large transfer (to about a 1/3 of the advertised speed). The drive itself gets very warm, which is probably a good thing for appropriate heat dissipation but the speed seems to stay lower at least until I unplug / replug it into my computer.The enclosure itself is a nice hard metal housing. I doubt anyone would very easily be able to accidentally crush it from normal use or by having it dangling on a keychain. However, the part that generally gets the most abuse, the actual USB connector is, isn't reinforced but is covered by a cap that seems somewhat secure.One thing that I think should be included to make this a much more versatile drive is to include a USB-C adapter or perhaps, make the drive USB-C with a USB-A adapter. Clearly, USB-C is the port nearly all devices will end up using in the near future, so sticking with a larger USB-A kind of keeps it trapped in the past.Overall, this isn't a bad drive. I quite like the build quality and the capacity. The speed is decent (when actually running at maximum levels) and allows me to transfer my photo library quickly without too much fuss. I just wish it was a bit more versatile or forward thinking.My Star Rating Guide:--------------------------------------------------------------------★ - Low Quality / fundamentally flawed product - I do not recommend it at all★★ - Poor Quality - Works, but is disappointing for various reasons.★★★ - Decent Quality - Is what it claims to be but there may be better options.★★★★ - Very Good - Worth considering.★★★★★ - Excellent - I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely to have a 1TB thumb drive
reviews.reviewText: Thumb drive stores data just fine. Don't have a large enough sample to truly test transfer speed, but my almost 10 year old computer would probably be the bottleneck anyway, so I'm happy it works great. I did place a Hobbit fan edit movie on it, plugged it into the back of the smart TV, and streamed the entire UHD movie from it just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You do get 1TB of storage in a high-quality package, but performance is not great
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Today I'm reviewing this Solid-state USB drive in the 1TB size by LQH tech,We're going to go ahead and take a quick look at this. Immediately this feels much heavier than you might expect. It is denser, when you pull this off it feels like there is a lot of metal here. Which is a very nice change of pace verses everything always being plastic and feeling cheap. This does feel like a significant item when you are holding it. The weight of this, on the scale shows a little less than an ounce, 0.8 ounces for the weight.What we'll do is test the write and read speed on a few file transfers. We'll verify it actually holds a full terabyte and then we can give a final rating. The physical quality of this feels really premium to me.Looks and feels are not everything. While exercising this drive I observed spiky transfer speeds and quickly declining performance. When the drive was empty and fresh, I observed quick data transfers of 170MB/s for several GBs. However, after ratcheting up the data and filling the drive the performance quickly waned and temperatures also raised. The thermal imaging showed the drive running warm at about 116 F in spots. The file transfers to the drive would regularly start at 170 MB/s, then after 50GB or so the speed would settle in at about 50MB/s. However, I did see transfers drop down to 4MB/s. For the price of this drive, I would hope for more consistently high performance. Read speeds were not super impressive either, but I did see a 260GB read settle in and average about ~250MB/s. Again, started stronger at 440, then dropped.I do appreciate the form factor and it is nice to not require a large caddy and USB cable, however for the price differential I think I'll stick with the caddy and cable. Performance is more important to me. Due to the low overall performance of this drive, I can only rate it three out of five stars.Pros- Full 1 TB in size (1,002,590,781,440 bytes, 933GB)- Small form factor- Premium feel- Quick read speeds compared to a normal USB stick drive (~253 MB/s sustained for a ~260GB transfer)Cons- Slows down significantly as it fills up or on large transfers (starts at 170 MB/s, then settles around 50, but sometimes sputters to only 5)- Runs a bit warm- Pricy compared to 2.5 inch SSDs and external carrier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing build quality and rapid speed transfer!!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. A great quality, very fast USB memory stick! I use a memory stick for my work and this is far better then my previous USB sticks. I keep them in my pocket whilst I am work as I need it at random times throughout the day and they often break and get tatty especially the plastic ones, but this has an excellent build quality and it is a lot more durable then my previous USB sticks. The transfer of data is so fast. I have added a video to show how it makes light weight of just short of 8GB of information in no time! It's brilliant!!I took a chance not knowing the brand and it has surpassed my expectations

日本語のレビューが無く不安でしたが、128GBを注文し2日目で到着しました。小さなしっかりとしたアルミ製ケースにSSDが入ってきました。これには好感が持てました。商品タイトルには最大600MB/s読み込み、500MB/s書き込み速度とありますが、当方の環境ではUSB3.2Gen1までしか検証できません。次の結果となりました。シーケンシャルRead：460MB／秒、シーケンシャルWrite384MB／秒。とりあえず1回だけの計測です。3.2Gen1のUSBメモリよりはるかに速いスピードが出ました。このSSDにはGenがいくつか記載されておらず、また商品名や型番すら記載がないのでそこは欲しい所です。耐久性については買ったばかりなのでわかりません。

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Premium quality and good Read/Write Speed
reviews.reviewText: Ordered two of the 128GB (119GB) sticks, dispatched and arrived within hours .The USB looks and feel premium, the read and write is between 300-400mbps.MAKE SURE YOU’RE USING THE USB 3.0 or 3.2 Ports as I initially just used the front usb ports on my PC and it’d only transfer up-to 39mbps… took my a little while to figure I wasn’t using the right USB port.Overall good product and would definitely recommend it to a friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A fast, reliable storage medium for a Raspberry Pi that's a much better alternative to using a SD card. I use one on an ADSB display kiosk, the case on the drive helps keep things cooler too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I set Linux to run from this pen drive and I am glad with its performance.
